item.description:
www.local149.com

Due to the success of the Goody Glover event, it's my pleasure to schedule another afternoon of fun.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


Local 149 does have a large table that will accommodate about a dozen people that might be interested in ordering food and (per them) plenty of space to stand around a socialize as well for those of us who are not eating and kind enough to let the foodies dine.

If you have any questions about parking, transportation, etc, you may find it's more productive to type the question into Google rather than into a comment here and share your hard won results with the rest of us as the extent of my knowledge on this subject is limited to what you see here.

Also, if you want to tour the fort in a burqa or with a paper bag over your head, knock yourself out (pun?). But if you'd like to come hang out with us for drinks, please post a picture (of your face).
item.name: Drinks at Local 149, Castle Island post event festivities
